constraints.name: mex_constraint
constraints.description: 最终的疼痛值是所有未被盾牌阻挡的魔法潜力集合的最小排除值（mex）
constraints.formal: pain = mex({p_i | spell i is not blocked})

constraints.name: activation_duration
constraints.description: 盾牌每次激活后可以阻挡接下来的 d 个魔法，之后需要等待 d 个魔法才能再次激活
constraints.formal: For each activation, the next d spells are blocked, and the shield cannot be activated for the following d spells

constraints.name: initial_activation_time
constraints.description: 盾牌最早可以在第一个魔法之前激活
constraints.formal: The shield can be activated before the first spell
